replies.author: hzdl
replies.txt_content:
世予予 发表于 2020-2-1 19:28
server.properties的内容也发一下
spawn-monsters=true
broadcast-rcon-to-ops=true
op-permission-level=4
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=default
hardcore=false
enable-command-block=false
max-players=20
network-compression-threshold=256
resource-pack-sha1=
max-world-size=29999984
function-permission-level=2
rcon.port=25575
server-port=25565
server-ip=
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=false
level-name=world
view-distance=10
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=false
rcon.password=
generate-structures=true
online-mode=true
max-build-height=256
level-seed=
prevent-proxy-connections=false
use-native-transport=true
motd=A Minecraft Server
enable-rcon=false

replies.author: haoxingxing
replies.txt_content:
1. 公网IP有没有(路由器WAN口IP 和 https://www.ipip.net/ 获取的IP是否一致)
如果没有,请使用内网穿透 frp ngrok等等等.....
2.  如果有,在路由器设置端口转发
  电脑IP:25565(内网端口) => 外网端口:25565/tcp
3. 告诉小伙伴你的IP 如 1.2.3.4 即可

replies.author: haoxingxing
replies.txt_content: 你开服的电脑和你运行游戏的电脑是同一个吗???

replies.author: hzdl
replies.txt_content:
haoxingxing 发表于 2020-2-1 19:37
你开服的电脑和你运行游戏的电脑是同一个吗???
是的

replies.author: hzdl
replies.txt_content:
haoxingxing 发表于 2020-2-1 19:37
你开服的电脑和你运行游戏的电脑是同一个吗???
该怎么进？

replies.author: 空谈杂想录
replies.txt_content:
127.0.0.1:25565
如果不行的话，win+r,输入 cmd,敲ipconfig,查看你的局域网ip地址，然后把上面的127.0.0.1换成局域网ip

replies.author: lian_shi
replies.txt_content: 和小伙伴玩租一个面板服就行了
